title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.39 - Burden of proof; de novo hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.39 - Burden of proof; de novo hearing

State Regulations
(a) The burden of proof of every allegation in a proceeding shall be on the party
asserting it. (b) A hearing under
these rules is de novo and parties may submit any testimony, documentary, or
other evidence which is material and relevant to the issue. Evidence submitted
to the Department of Labor prior to the hearing must be resubmitted at the
hearing for it to be considered by the Board. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
65.39

Adopted

New

York State Register March 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 13, eff. 3/30/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
